title: Katteri (Kannada)
short_cast: Vaibhav Reddy, Sonam Bajwa, Varalakshmi Sarathkumar, Aathmika, Karunakaran, Ravi Mariya
cast: Vaibhav Reddy, Sonam Bajwa, Varalakshmi Sarathkumar, Aathmika, Karunakaran, Ravi Mariya

desc: A group of bungling crooks heads to a deserted village to seek out hidden treasure — but aren't prepared for the gaggle of ghosts they encounter inside.
